raw_comment:
1. I notice that in all of the major sport leagues shown, the percent of players of color is larger than the percent of head coaches of color.
2. I wonder what the percentages would look like for the year when each sport league was started.
3. This impacts me and my community because we can see the diversified team leadership being represented through sports.
4. This graph is showing the percent of players of color and the percent of head coaches of color for various sports leagues from 2019 or 2020.
ace_sentences: The major sport leagues are shown in the graph.
In each shown sport league, the percent of players of color is larger than the percent of head coaches of color.
I wonder what the percentages were in the year when each sport league started.
We can see diversified team leadership through sports.
The graph shows the percent of players of color for various sport leagues.
The graph shows the percent of head coaches of color for various sport leagues.
The data in the graph is from 2019 or 2020.
